title: AwoX Smart CONTROL
summary: Simply the best way to enjoy your home lighting atmosphere.
description: AwoX Smart CONTROL allows you to discover and remotely control your energy-saving AwoX SmartLIGHT and your AwoX SmartPLUG. Fine-tune mood lighting using pre-defined favorites or themes, with one or groups of light bulbs, and optimize your energy consumption.NEW ! You can now control the new Bluetooth Mesh bulbs range. MESH features:- Bluetooth secured network- Group management up to 50 lightbulbs- Extended coverage of connectivity by installing multiple bulbs within a home- Simultaneous control from several smart phones- Program multiple schedules for turning lighting off/onNEW ! Creation of a Cloud account has become mandatory since the introduction of Bluetooth Mesh lightbulbs onto the market.Creating a cloud account enables users get their settings saved onto the Cloud, and to share preferences between users within a household.Bluetooth Mesh security protocols require a unique connection per household so members of the same home can use Mesh lightbulbs on a network that is both private and secure; an essential function considering the large scale deployment of connected lighting on the market.Account creation takes only a few seconds, and once authenticated in the app, the user does not need to re-enter his or her login and password.Notice: in order to manage AwoX SmartLIGHTs, AromaLIGHTs and SmartPLUGs, your phone/tablet must be Bluetooth 4.0 compliant (SmartReady), and with Android 4.3+ installed. Else, you will be only able to detect and control the AwoX StriimLIGHTs BT Color.Notice: Android 6.0+ users must accept location permission and activate location service in order to be able to discover Bluetooth Low Energy devices.
descriptionHTML:
AwoX Smart CONTROL allows you to discover and remotely control your energy-saving AwoX SmartLIGHT and your AwoX SmartPLUG. Fine-tune mood lighting using pre-defined favorites or themes, with one or groups of light bulbs, and optimize your energy consumption.

NEW ! You can now control the new Bluetooth Mesh bulbs range. MESH features:
- Bluetooth secured network
- Group management up to 50 lightbulbs
- Extended coverage of connectivity by installing multiple bulbs within a home
- Simultaneous control from several smart phones
- Program multiple schedules for turning lighting off/on

NEW ! Creation of a Cloud account has become mandatory since the introduction of Bluetooth Mesh lightbulbs onto the market.
Creating a cloud account enables users get their settings saved onto the Cloud, and to share preferences between users within a household.
Bluetooth Mesh security protocols require a unique connection per household so members of the same home can use Mesh lightbulbs on a network that is both private and secure; an essential function considering the large scale deployment of connected lighting on the market.
Account creation takes only a few seconds, and once authenticated in the app, the user does not need to re-enter his or her login and password.

Notice: in order to manage AwoX SmartLIGHTs, AromaLIGHTs and SmartPLUGs, your phone/tablet must be Bluetooth 4.0 compliant (SmartReady), and with Android 4.3+ installed. Else, you will be only able to detect and control the AwoX StriimLIGHTs BT Color.

Notice: Android 6.0+ users must accept location permission and activate location service in order to be able to discover Bluetooth Low Energy devices.
comments: The control fell one time on the ground and can't connect to the bulb anymore but it still blinks when I press any button. So I tried the app and even tho the bulb appears on my bluethood scan, in the app it always says it can't detect any device.

Was working fine for a month. Now it tries to update my light's firmware but the app is unable to connect to it. Tried to remove the device and even reinstall the application but no luck. Please help!
After the first connect, doesnt worked. Since 3 weeks no answer from support. Very dissappointed...
Worked for an hour or so. Now the app doesn't pick up the bulbs anymore. They work fine with the app for the iPhone though. Fix it!

Sad moment! Nice idea but application doesn't work! Thanks at least I have the remote control, I cannot connect the remote control with the app never worked! How it is possible? When reviewed the comments can see is a general problem! @Eglo any solution?  Who I asked me to contact them, I did it but not responding, updated the new version and simply doesn't work, tried with 3 different phones. Don't buy it if you don't have a controller, the application doesn't work.

Hey there! I had the same issues as most of the users here, while trying to establish a connection with my Fueva 1 lamp for the first time. The app always got stuck at the last step of the connection wizard, with the litlle green circle spinning until the end of times. However, in one of the many attempts after restarting the app, I tried to leave everything as default in the wizard setup and it worked like a charm. With that, I mean that I didn't change either the picture nor the name of the lamp, just hit "next" until it was over and it worked fine. I had another lamp installed in another room, so I tried this method again and it also worked, first try. So there you go, looks like an annoying bug but at least seems to have an easy solution. Later I could change the names and picture of both lamps without any problem or issues with the connection. Hope this helped someone!
recentChanges: Added new Mesh bulbs firmware (improved general connectivity)
